title: How much does Skillshare cost? - Quora

response.answer_text: Currently, Skillshare costs $99 for one year. If you sign up with a referral link from a teacher, you will get 2 months for free to start. (Yes, I am a Skillshare teacher and yes, here’s my referral link, and yes, I get an affiliate payment for each sign up. https://skl.sh/2kHjyaE )
